text: tatha allaah hee ka hai, jo aakaashon aur dharatee mein hai aur hamane tumase poorv ahle kitaab ko tatha (khud) tumhen aadesh diya hai ki allaah se darate raho. yadi tum kuphr (avagya) karoge, to nihsandeh jo kuchh aakaashon tatha dharatee mein hai, vah allaah hee ka hai tatha allaah nisprh[1] prashansit hai
